definition: pipet consisting of a small tube with a vacuum bulb at one end for drawing liquid in and releasing it a drop at a time
details:
noun
- pipet consisting of a small tube with a vacuum bulb at one end for drawing liquid in and releasing it a drop at a time
= example: pipet consisting of a small tube with a vacuum bulb at one end for drawing liquid in and releasing it a drop at a time
= synonyms: eye dropper
